CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 21, reads: "A demonstration of the inside of a furnace was made by the Home Comfort Company in their booth. Bernie Seidenstein and Marvin Levy explained the details to the onlookers. Other colorful booths and displays not shown are Downtown Pontiac Motors, 2001 W. Liberty Avenue: Cott Beverages, featuring full quart beverages: Gutbro Construction Company, 106 Market Street; McMillen & Baer Plymouth Dealers, Crafton Boulevard and Stratmore: Automart Chrysler Dealer, 3201 Boulevard of the Allies, Crosley-Bendix Dealer, Thumpson and Company, 623 Penn Avenue, Downtown."
TitMainTitle: Bernie Seidenstein and Marvin Levy standing on either side of open furnace display for the Home Comfort Company booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
